sk1.name: Stifling Dagger
sk1.desc: Deals minor pure damage and slows the enemy unit's movement speed. Deals half damage to heroes.

sk2.name: Phantom Strike
sk2.desc: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

sk3.name: Blur
sk3.desc: The Phantom Assassin becomes hard to see by blurring her body and disappearing from the enemy minimap when near enemy heroes. Some enemy attacks miss.

sk4.name: Coup de Grace
sk4.desc: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.
